name: The Desolation
storyline: The year is 2140. A fragmented and militarized human race has conquered Mars, advanced into transhumanism, and left only a fractured remnant of itself behind on Mother Earth. We could not have been less ready for the arrival of “The Shade”. Now every faction of humanity must feel the terrifying impact of this horde of highly-adaptive synthetic alien beings who have already begun to infect our forces with their insidious parasitic technology. In the middle of a ferocious war for the heart of mankind, you must don your Exo Suit, itself infused and infected with malicious Shade nano-technology, and make your own impact to save your world.
summary: The Desolation brings a complete cross-platform co-op looter-shooter experience to PC and mobile devices. Make your impact across endless procedurally generated worlds via cooperative action combat, deep build customization and richly satisfying tactical gameplay.
